transcript:
Customer: Hello.

Executive: Hello. Haan Manish sir. Good afternoon.
Customer: Sir Manish sir to nahi hai unke office me baat ho rahi hai.
Executive: Achcha achcha okay okay. Sir Ashraf baat kar raha tha IndiaMART se. Actually me sir ek issue ye tha jo doctor Sabarwal wound care aapki company nankar rahi hai IndiaMART pe. To usme aapka export ka plan chalta hai. Theek hai? Aur wo plan abhi koi use hi nahi kar raha hai sir matlab ek mahine zyada hi ho gaya hai. To mujhe nahi lag raha usme kuch benefit bhi nikal pa rahe honge aap log IndiaMART se. To koi problem.
Executive: Sir wo actually kya ki na wo humne matlab staff rakha tha uske liye specially tha. Oh achcha achcha staff me. But wo thoda sa weak tha nahi to fir wo hai nahi. Achcha staff rakhe hai to uske paas koi karenge.
Customer: Haan sir iska thoda sa dhyan me rakhna padega. Ab kya hamare ki par wo staff ke chakkar me kahi sab baakiyo ke paas rehti itna kam hai to wo us pe thoda dhyan de pa rahe the.
Executive: Haan haan haan.
Customer: Sir na ek aur issue bhi bata rahe the mujhe buyer ki call ko lekar ke. Ki buyer ki call aati hai aur matlab miss ho jati hai. To maine call logs check kiye. Theek hai? Ab jaise November me bhi char call aayi do call receive bhi hui hai aur do call miss ho gayi hai. Aur October me do call aayi thi ek receive ek miss fir September me bhi yahi tha.
Executive: September tak pata kya hai jaise pehle to wo October tak to dusri staff tha. Ab ye November jaise ab hamare paas hai mere paas hai yaha pe ke paas hota hai. Abhi hota na ab pakka nahi hai na at present ki ab kaun uthayega kaun nahi uthayega hum kisi pe ungli kaise utha de.
Customer: Haan nahi nahi theek hai theek hai theek hai. Dekho sir do hi number hai dekho ek to maine aap pe call kar liya theek hai aur ek dusra number hai jisme last me 310 hai to wo kiske paas hota hai sir?
Executive: Wo Manish sir ke paas hota hai.
Customer: Wo Manish sir ke paas hota hai. Theek hai. To wahi unka kehna tha ki call matlab aate hi cut ja rahi hai. Ho sakta hai kuch cases me aisa ho sakta hai maybe ho ja raha ho.
Executive: Wo sahi keh rahe ho kuch cases me aisa hai jaise aapko call aayegi call aate hi jaise wo karte na cut ho jaegi wo.
Customer: Achcha achcha. Sir yaha pe dekho actually me dekho actual reason to mujhe bhi nahi pata but do teen circumstances ho sakte hai ho sakta hai buyer ne aise try kiya ho call connect karta ho aur lagta hai ki lag gaya try kar raha hota hai na ki number connectable hai ki nahi ho sakta hai usne call lagaya turant disconnect kar dega. Dusri cheez kabhi kabar network ho sakta hai utna best na ho ki jaise call lagi to lekin wo survive nahi kar payi immediately wo disconnect ho gayi. Hai na jaise main abhi aaj ek ek client ko maine na aaj teen char bar call lagai wo lag nahi raha tha lekin unke paas bolne ke mere paas na ek do teen bar maine lagaya lekin unke paas ek bar ek ring ho kar ke disconnect ho gayi fir unka call back aaya.
Executive: Notification aa rahi thi aa gayi.
Customer: Haan notification type ki aa gayi ki true caller pe notification pehle hi aa jata hai ki call lagana chah raha hai. To aisa thoda sa mail to hamari taraf se pehle hi aa jata hoga. Achcha ab kyuki sir dekho mere yaha pe na feedback bhi dena padega company me mujhse puchegi ki bhai aapne IndiaMART pe customer se baat kari to na unka dekho aapke yaha pe na sir na koi abhi jaise ki aapne bata diya wo to main mention kar dunga ki yaha pe ek account manager tha pura handle karta tha IndiaMART to wo abhi lead nahi is wajah se le pa rahe ho aur reply reply bhi kyuki lead manager bhi nahi use ho raha hai is wajah se. Theek hai? Aur ek hota hai aapka ratings and reviews jo IndiaMART pe aapke customers ne diya hai bahut achcha hai overall 4.8 hai out of five. Hai na total 10 customers ne diya hai bas ek hi customer tha pichle march me pata nahi usne teen three star diya tha otherwise sabka five star hi hai. To wo agar ho sake to ek bar review karwa lijiyega jab koi naya jab koi naya account manager aaye na sir ek bar hum log se interaction zarur karaiyega IndiaMART pe thoda sa usko hum pura.
Executive: Nahi nahi sir wo rakh liya hai waise aur ye matlab inki training wagera chal rahi hai jaise hi wo puri hoti hai to wo training wagera ke liye aapko bhi bolenge.
Customer: Achcha achcha achcha. Bas ek bar training aapko aap logo se kuch dilwani padegi na unko.
Executive: Hum to sab karwa denge sir video meeting karke pura unko samjha denge A to Z. Ek ek sir bas ek idea aur chahiye tha aapse ki jaise matlab aap log ko IndiaMART pe kafi time ho gaya to business kuch nikal pata hai ki nahi sir IndiaMART ke through?
Customer: Sir wo kya hai ki hum usko divert karke na IndiaMART se apne me wo karna padta hai kyuki hamara jo time hai wo dusre me zyada rehta hai. Hamara wo abhi jaise man lo kisi party ne rate vote pucha humne rate bata diya aur kaam khatam ho gaya.
Customer: Theek hai theek hai. Time taking jaise bhi rehta hai IndiaMART matlab uske andar. Haan thoda time tekkani.
Customer: To koi matlab IndiaMART ke through koi matlab koi saman matlab gaya bhi hai ki nahi sir foreign abhi tak ye bhi thoda idea lena chahta tha aapse. Business.
Executive: Is foreign se gaya hai.
Customer: Achcha achcha tab tak theek hai matlab mujhe laga ki aisa to nahi ki bilkul bekar ja raha hai plan hi sir aap.
Executive: Nahi sir agar aisa hota to hum tension nahi na.
Customer: Haan haan kyuki wo ab aisa hai bhi na sir ki business karne ke liye thoda time to jata hi hai but abhi kya hai beech me maine dekha tha ek bar aur bhi maine call lagai thi to kisi se baat nahi hoti thi ki achi bulk leads bhi thi aur wahi kyuki call ko pilot koi consume nahi kar raha tha to maine call bhi lagai thi pilot maine dekha ki achi quantity ki bhi thi aur achi jagah ki bhi thi jaise US UK ki thi matlab waha pe to achcha price mil jata hai product ka na to us wajah se call lagai thi. Baki theek hai sir unka matlab ek wahi feedback tha to ek bar abhi call ka hi tha waise to to main abhi jaise aapko feedback share karunga to aap satisfied sir mark kar dijiyega hai na theek hai sir.
Executive: Thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Export plan not being utilized effectively.

- Buyer calls are being missed.

- Inconsistent call handling due to staff changes.

- Lack of a dedicated account manager.



Resolution:

- Executive acknowledged the staff issues.

- Executive confirmed new staff training in progress.

- Executive offered video meeting for training new manager.

- Executive confirmed foreign business through IndiaMART.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will share feedback; executive to mark satisfied.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, account manager, call quality, feedback
